name: Qublyne Dungeons
description:
An engaging retro vibe arcade to relax and overpass your achievements with every game.
Pickup resources and use them to aquire physical and magical powers of your choice
to defeat opponents while avoiding obstacles and traps in your path.

Complement your play sessions with a suitable generated game environment,
lighting mood and ambient track of you liking to get the game rhythm going.

ITEMS

Use over 30 physical and magical items at your will to defeat your opponents.

ENEMY`s

Combat with over 15 types of enemy`s with different skills and abilities.

TRAPS and OBSTACLES

Use your skills to avoid the many traps and obstacles in your path.

RESOURCES

Collect and use resources at your disposal to achieve your goals.

MUSIC and MOOD

Choose a suiting sountrack and ambient mood to complement your play style.

CHALLENGES

Take on challenges and boast your highest scores.
